function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Coronavirus settling for a longer time period on surfaces at lower temperatures and in conditions of low and high relative humidity","Impact":"Increased risk of surface transmission of the virus, leading to higher infection rates","Mitigation":"Regulate indoor temperature and humidity levels, and implement regular surface cleaning and disinfection protocols","Technologies":"Temperature and humidity control systems, UV light disinfection technology, antimicrobial coatings for surfaces","People":"Building occupants and visitors","Owner":"Building management, facility maintenance staff"},{"Description":"COVID-19 lasting for several days on certain materials such as plastics, ceramics, silicone rubber, glass, and stainless steel","Impact":"Potential for prolonged surface contamination and increased risk of transmission","Mitigation":"Use of alternative materials, regular cleaning and disinfection, and implementation of antimicrobial surface coatings","Technologies":"Material science for developing virus-resistant surfaces, antimicrobial coatings, advanced cleaning technologies","People":"Building occupants and visitors","Owner":"Building management, facility maintenance staff"},{"Description":"Advantages of copper and copper alloys in killing the virus and as building materials for high-touch surfaces","Impact":"Reduced risk of virus transmission on high-touch surfaces and from contaminated materials","Mitigation":"Use of copper and copper alloys for building materials and high-touch surfaces, exploration of cost-effective copper-alloy composites","Technologies":"Cold-spray technique for applying copper coatings, antimicrobial polymer surfaces, copper-alloy composites","People":"Architects, building designers, construction companies","Owner":"Building developers, construction companies"}]}
